author: rekovic
body:
#### PR description:

New package ```DataFormats/L1TParticleFlow``` for Phase2 L1Trigger.

These classes are intended to hold L1T objects reconstructed using PartcleFlow and PUPPI algorithms in back-end elecronics boards of Phase2 L1Trigger system:
- Layer1
- Layer2

as described in the Phase2 L1 TDR.
title: New package DataFormats/L1TParticleFlow for Phase2 L1Trigger
